summary: Frontend resume button was updated to point to a presumed backend download route and keep loading/unavailable states, but no backend implementation or seeding of the PDF is shown in the diff. Additionally, the frontend sets a different downloaded filename than requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Store the resume PDF in the Motoko backend (stable state) and expose an HTTP download route that returns the PDF with appropriate headers so the browser downloads it as a file.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains no backend Motoko changes (no backend/main.mo updates) implementing stable storage of the PDF or an http_request route returning application/pdf with Content-Disposition attachment, nor a non-200 response when unset.
evidence: MODIFIED FILES list contains only frontend/src/components/portfolio/ResumeDownloadButton.tsx, frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json

missing_requirements.requirement: Seed the backend with the current resume PDF named "Hamza-Ali-Arshad-Resume-20251211-(1).pdf" so it is available immediately after deployment without manual upload steps.
missing_requirements.reason: No backend code or asset seeding changes are shown; the diff does not include any added PDF bytes/blob or initialization in stable state.
evidence: MODIFIED FILES list contains only frontend/src/components/portfolio/ResumeDownloadButton.tsx, frontend-file-summaries.txt, project_state.json

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the frontend "Download Resume" button to download the resume from the backend download route while keeping existing disabled/loading behavior; served filename matches the specified PDF name via Content-Disposition.
missing_requirements.reason: The button points to a backend-like route and retains loading/unavailable UI, but the anchor sets download="Hamza-Ali-Arshad-Resume.pdf", which does not match the required filename "Hamza-Ali-Arshad-Resume-20251211-(1).pdf" and may override the backend-provided filename.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend forces the downloaded filename to "Hamza-Ali-Arshad-Resume.pdf" via the HTML download attribute.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifies the served filename should match "Hamza-Ali-Arshad-Resume-20251211-(1).pdf" (via Content-Disposition), but the diff adds a different hardcoded filename on the frontend download attribute.
